title: Tech Workers Coalition Global Expansion: 21 Chapters and Resistance Infrastructure (2014-2025)
description: Map the growth of the Tech Workers Coalition from its 2014 founding to 21 global chapters, documenting the development of organized resistance infrastructure including tactics like malicious compliance and code repository documentation.
research_areas: How did the Tech Workers Coalition expand from its founding to 21 global chapters?
What specific resistance tactics have proven most effective across different companies?
How do coalitions coordinate across international boundaries?
Which major tech companies have faced the most sustained employee resistance?
How have companies adapted their policies in response to organized resistance?
source_requirements: Coalition formation documents, chapter growth records, tactics manuals, corporate policy changes, international coordination communications
pdf_source: Technology Worker Resistance and Constitutional Cryptography_ Tools for Democratic Resilience.pdf
